title: Youjo Shachou
opening_song: "Susume! Mujina Company (進め！むじなカンパニー)" by Neko Hacker feat. Najimu Mujina (Rina Hidaka), Mayu Warito (Hisako Kanemoto), Yuki Karuizawa (Sumire Uesaka), and Dekasegi Garcia (Sayaka Kaneko)
ending_song: "Kaisha ni Kaerou! (会社に帰ろう!)" by Mayu Warito (Hisako Kanemoto) feat. Kotori Koiwai
sinopse:
The president of Mujina Company, Najimu Mujina, isn't originally an adult, nor does she possess a genius intellect: she's a very ordinary 5-year-old girl. Followed by her indulgent and talented secretary, an office clerk of unknown nationality, and an employee who plays the straight man, the president charges into the world every day.

(Source: MU, edited)
